DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 study will evaluate PDE10 enzyme occupancy using Positron Emission Tomography after a single dose of PF-02545920 in Healthy male volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The PDE10 Enzyme Occupancy Following A Single Dose Of PF-02545920 In Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: healthy male volunteers History of orthostatic hypotension History of prior radiation exposure for research purposes, or radiation therapy
